prompt:
Translate the following subtitles into Korean. 

Correct speech recognition errors and inconsistencies based on context.

Note that the original timestamps should be PRESERVED for each entry.

PLEASE DON'T CHANGE ORIGINAL TIMESTAMPS. 

Subtitles to process:
[
  {
    "start": "00:00:00,000",
    "end": "00:00:00,920",
    "lang": "zh",
    "text": "这个冰滴犬可以"
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:01,920",
    "end": "00:00:03,400",
    "lang": "zh",
    "text": "有冰滴犬的贵宾犬"
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:03,400",
    "end": "00:00:05,480",
    "lang": "zh",
    "text": "说了一天他冰滴犬了"
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:05,480",
    "end": "00:00:07,220",
    "lang": "zh",
    "text": "OMG 那个好不加危险"
  }
]

Output JSON format only:
```json
[
  {
    "start": "timestamp",
    "end": "timestamp",
    "ko": "Korean text"
  }
]
```

response.ko: 이 얼음 방울 강아지는 할 수 있어요
하루 종일 얼음 방울 강아지 얘기했어요
